\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ca75d1ef3213e1f65f51a3cefe6be37c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={110}
P(A \mid B) = \frac{P(B \mid A) \, P(A)}{P(B)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={125}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[786bff47bed0904b9ad7e294a022df17]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={127}
\begin{aligned}
P(Yes | Sunny) &= \frac{P (Sunny | Yes) * P (Yes) }{P(Sunny)}\\
&= ((3/9) * (9/14))/(5/14) = 0.6\\
P(No | Sunny) &= \frac{P (Sunny | No) * P (No)}{P(Sunny)} \\
&= ((2/5) * (5/14))/(5/14) = 0.4
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[915414c73d7f33b29735bdbc61a8abba]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={163}
P(c \mid x_1, x_2, ... x_n) = \frac{P(x_1,x_2, ... x_n \mid c) \, P(c)}{P(x_1,x_2, ... x_n)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={193}

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[71b91f52921236d0e2b3c8ed7e65b48f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={201}
P(x_1, ... x_n \mid c) = P(x_1|c)⋅P(x_2|c)⋅⋅⋅P(x_n|c)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

P(c \mid x_1, ... x_n) = P(x_1|c)⋅P(x_2|c)⋅⋅⋅P(x_n|c) P(c)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
